title: MISSMAY Women's Vintage Floral Lace Ruffle Half Sleeve Evening Party Formal Long Dress
description: Size RECOMMEND: US 4/6(Small), US 8/10(Medium), US 10/12(Large), US 14/16(X-Large), US 18/20 (XX-Large); The fabric of this dress is less stretchy, recommended that you can choose a size up if you don't like the tight fit effect
Deep V Neck, 3/4 Sleeve, Back Zipper, Floor Length
Elegant Ruffle Waist Design, High Split Slim Fishtail Style, Suit for Evening, Cocktail, Wedding Party and Formal Occasion
Please Note that The Top Lace is Stretchy and Please Refer to the Size Chart in the Left Product Description Picture
Care Instructions: Please Put The Dress Into A Laundry Bag To Wash It With Low Temperature And Iron It Carefully In Low Temperature Too
